channel.title: Need someone to help me out here!
channel.description:
[s]Can someone tell me how to use Hamachi? I know it sounds really dumb but I seriously want to know how to use so other people can finally get on my server for once. Thanks![/s]
Can someone attempt to get on my server through Hamachi?
If you're still reading, you're probably going to help me out so here's the information you need for joining it:
[b]IP:[/b] 5.148.67.99 [b]Name:[/b] BarteloScape [b]Password:[/b] bacon [b]Port Number:[/b] 5555

item.title: Need someone to help me out here!
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:


All You Need To Do Is Click On The Triangle And Create A Network And Join A Network Will pop Up…Click On Create Network To Go On To…


This One Is Self Explanatory As You Guess

Now Tell Everyone Your Network Name And Password And There On Ur Server With Your IP Adress And Port You Are Using And Bingo…They Can Go On Your Loverly Server…
(^^) Hope This Helps (^^)

From Your friendly Neighbourhood Tythus

Read full topic
